Methodically searches law library computer databases and prints voluminous legal documents relevant to her research.

Demonstrates perseverance by staying late into the night studying difficult material.

Methodically searches through legal files and organizes notes carefully.
Admits to her mistake openly and asks Callahan not to laugh, showing humility and sincerity.

Discards an earlier flawed brief after realizing its problems, showing self-awareness and willingness to improve.
